attributes.action: reverse the decision of the Vehicle Tax refund rules which prevents Motor Dealers applying for refunds from January 2009.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many Motor Dealers have recently learnt that Government through a finance act in the 07/08 Budget has passed the changes of Road Fund Licence refunds so a Motor Dealer cannot apply for a refund unless they are the registered keeper. This is worth over a Million pounds of income to the Motor Industry which without this will affect Motor Dealers and their employees future in these difficult times. Please petition against this now.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "reverse the decision of the Vehicle Tax refund rules which prevents Motor Dealers applying for refunds from January 2009."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18373
